Key Match Events: Tanzid Hasan opened the batting for Bangladesh as Soumya Sarkar's concussion replacement.
Soumya Sarkar suffered a neck injury when he crashed into the boundary board.
Anamul Haque and Jaker Ali collided on the field while attempting a catch.
Mustafizur Rahman was stretchered off after suffering cramps.
Mushfiqur Rahim suffered a finger injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Richard Kettleborough opted to stay away from officiating in the second innings due to extreme heat.
Jaker Ali was taken to the hospital after his collision with Anamul Haque.
